title: Terraform
pageDescription: Terraform — this is an open source software using the “Infrastructure as Code” (Infrastructure as Code, IAC) approach, created by Hashicorp.It allows users to determine the infrastructure using the declarative language of the JSON -based configuration.
shortDescription: Using Terraform provider VK Cloud for platform management, quick start and sample manifests
metaDescription: Using Terraform provider VK Cloud for platform management, quick start and sample manifests.
markdown: Using Terraform provider VK Cloud for platform management, quick start and sample manifests.
